name: Caterva (itch)
description:
This is the first version of a third-person shooter where you control a group of poor slaves trying desperately to escape their terrible fate.

"I know he still has some issues and bugs, and the enemies are just gray cubes, but I will upload a new version every month and share all the new things it contains. I also try to share my work in progress weekly on my social networks.

I will greatly appreciate all your comments and suggestions. Everything helps me improve these games."

Controls:

Move:  Arrows or WASD
Aim:  Mouse
Shot:  Left Click
